tutorial for crochet eyes pattern start fair isle dress sweater is worked from the neck down initially in row and then in joined rounds then the sleeves are crocheted on row 1 using red yarn ch21 half_double_crochet into second chain from the hook work 2hdc into the next chain *half_double_crochet into the next chain work 2hdc into the next chain repeat from * across turn 30sts fasten_off red yarn and attach white yarn row 2 ch1 not a st from now on single_crochet into each of the first 4sts skip the next 7sts single_crochet into each of the next 8sts skip the next 7sts single_crochet into each of the remaining 4sts turn 16sts & two arm holes round 3 ch1 half_double_crochet in each of the first 3sts work 2hdc into the next st *half_double_crochet into each of the next 3sts work 2hdc into the next st repeat from * across join the last st to the first with a slip_stitch 20sts now is the best time to test the fit of your dress if it s too tight try reworking the last 3 rounds with a bigger hook if it s took big try reworking them with a smaller hook fasten_off white yarn and reattach red yarn round 4 ch1 single_crochet into each st around join as before 20sts round 5 ch1 single_crochet into each of the first 3sts work 2sc into the next st *single_crochet into each of the next 3sts work 2sc into the next st repeat from * around join 25sts fasten_off red yarn and reattach white yarn round 6 ch1 single_crochet into each st around join 25sts round 7 ch1 single_crochet into each of the first 4sts work 2sc into the next st *single_crochet into each of the next 4sts work 2sc into the next st repeat from * around join 30sts fasten_off white yarn and reattach red yarn round 8 ch1 single_crochet into each st around join 30sts round 9 ch1 single_crochet into each of the first 5sts work 2sc into the next st *single_crochet into each of the next 5sts work
